This blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last.

relproducts.title: Splash Vine Green Panel Blind
relproducts.description: Their moisture-resistant splash vine green panel blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. The lush green panel is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. As panel blinds reach a massive 5 metres width and 3,. 5 metres drop, this makes it one of the largest blinds we make. A popular blind for large windows and doors, or as a modern room-divider, this blind is not only durable but versatile by design.

relproducts.title: Uniview 3200 Spectre Black/grey 89mm Vertical Blind
relproducts.description: Their uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a pvc / polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, their 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Their spectre black / grey is a bold, modern choice.
